column3: Upgrade Termbox to the newest version and add mouse select support
We get a trailing newline in documents we save
Implement a sort command that can be run on a specific column
Generate help documentation from arg list and command descript stored in BuiltInProc
It should be possible to only show help for a single command, help ?command?
Implement a filter command that creates a new document based on a regexp that should match a specified column
Should indicate if a document has been changed since it was last saved
Should use a temporary file while editing, so we don't lose any data in a crash
